sourcesContent:
import translate from '../../data/staticTranslate' import countryData from '../../data/country' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import localize from '../../data/localize' const Delivery = ({ data, setData, error, onBlur, setError}) => { const router = useRouter() const {lang} = localize(router.locale) const [state, setState] = useState({ email: '', phone: '', name: '', surname: '', country: '', city: '', address: '', code: '', anotherAddressCheck: false, companyDataCheck: false }) const handleChange = (name, value) => { let newData = data; setError({...error, [name]: false}) newData[name] = value; setData({...newData}) } useEffect(() => { setState(data) }, [data]) return (
onBlur('email')} value={state.email} onChange={(e) => handleChange('email', e.target.value)} tabIndex="1"/>
handleChange('phone', e.target.value)} tabIndex="2"/>
handleChange('name', e.target.value)} tabIndex="3"/>
handleChange('surname', e.target.value)} tabIndex="4"/>
handleChange('city', e.target.value)} tabIndex="6"/>
handleChange('address', e.target.value)} tabIndex="7"/>
handleChange('code', e.target.value)} tabIndex="8"/>
) } export default Delivery
